title: How-To: Add a Dynamic URL to Query Results
description:
Create a dynamic, per-row hyperlink field in your query output using format().
This lets you click from a table of results directly into another system such as a ticketing tool,
documentation site, or another LogScale query that takes an ID from each event.

examples.name: Create link to external system per repo
examples.description: Adds a markdown link that points to an external tool using the repo field as a path segment.
